thread.title: Halsey Is Channeling TLC At The Grammys
thread.title_full: Halsey Is Channeling TLC At The Grammys

author: Liz Raiss
title: Halsey Is Channeling TLC At The Grammys
text:
Liz Raiss 5m ago 
Let's be clear: no one can truly embody the irreverence and swagger that characterized TLC's style. But Halsey is giving it her best shot at the 2017 Grammy Awards . 
Clad in a body chain and flowing blue silk pajamas, the pop singer does her best impression of T-Boz in the "Creep" video on the red carpet, crediting Aaliyah and TLC as influences in an interview with Giuliana Rancic. 
Check the video and the outfit, below.
